dialogue.htmlContent:
The entrance hall to Lyssieth's palace is staggeringly opulent, and is in complete contrast to the dark, drab exterior. The floor beneath your feet is a perfectly polished expanse of clean white marble, and is adorned with a luxuriant red runner carpet which stretches off down the three corridors that are linked to each side of the hall. The walls are covered in white, wooden panelling; their decorative, intricately-carved features are painted in bright gold. Gigantic portraits of regal-looking demons and humans hang on the walls, and up above, the high ceiling is lavishly decorated in the same white-and-gold style as the rest of your surroundings.

Taking a closer look at your surroundings, you take note of the fact that there are a couple of half-demon and human maids standing to attention on opposite sides of the hall. Obviously having been trained exceptionally well, they remain completely motionless as they wait for you to leave this area.

Deciding to leave Lyssieth's palace, you exit through the same wicket gate by which you enetered, and head out over the drawbridge back into Submission. Once at the far side, Elizabeth turns to face you, and asks, [elizabeth.speech(Ah, [pc.name], did your business with Lyssieth go well?)]

[pc.speech(Yes, thank you,)] you respond, before quickly saying that you need to be on your way.

[elizabeth.speech(Very well,)] Elizabeth responds, [elizabeth.speech(If you ever need to visit Lyssieth again, you have full permission to come and go from her palace as you please.)]

Thanking the half-succubus for the information, you continue on your way into Submission, and start heading back across the huge cavern's floor...

Each corridor of Lyssieth's palace is just as ostentatiously luxurious as the next. Just like the entrance hall, the floor is of polished white marble, with a red runner carpet laid down the very centre. The walls are panelled in white and gold, and upon them hang huge portraits of demons and humans. Up above, the high ceiling is trimmed with decorative mouldings, and in even intervals, huge crystal chandeliers hang down to illuminate your surroundings.

Lining the walls, there are countless marble statues, ornate seats, and glass-fronted display cabinets. While most of these are filled with expected array of china and other miscellaneous decorative articles, there are several which house relics from Lily's museum, as well as one or two which contain extremely mundane objects from the outside world.

Just as in the rest of the palace, there's an occasional half-demon or human maid standing up against a wall, waiting for you to pass before continuing with her duties.

The corridors which branch off to the left and right of the main entrance hall are slightly narrower than the one which leads directly to Lyssieth's office. There are also far fewer ornamental objects lining the walls, and, most notably of all, there are a series of narrow, arrow-slit-like windows set into one side. Looking out of one of these, you see Elizabeth and her troops standing guard on the other side of the drawbridge. Other than those royal guard, however, there's nothing really much to see from here, and so you continue on your way forwards.

Just as in the rest of the palace, there's an occasional half-demon or human maid standing up against a wall, waiting for you to pass before continuing with her duties.

The rooms on this floor of Lyssieth's palace all have their doors wide open, and, peering inside, you see that each one appears to be a well-furnished drawing room. Plush sofas, extravagantly-carved coffee tables, and even the odd piano can be found in these places. In a similar fashion to the palace's corridors, portraits of demons and humans line the walls, while underfoot, luxuriant carpeting provides a comfortable surface upon which to stand.

Within each of these room, one or two maids are standing to attention, dutifully waiting to serve any of Lyssieth's guests.

In each wing of the palace, there is a long, extravagantly-furnished dining hall, in which you assume Lyssieth must entertain her guests. The rich mahogany table that runs down the middle of the room must be at least twenty metres in length, and to either side sit a huge number of regal-looking chairs.

With the exception of two half-demon maids standing to attention on either side of the room, the hall is completely unoccupied.

A huge, red-carpeted staircase, which reminds you very much of the one in Lilaya's home, leads to the upper floors of the palace. As you approach it, a half-demon maid steps forwards to block your passage. With a respectful curtsy, she says, [genericFemale.speech(A thousand apologies, [pc.sir], but I regret to inform you that we've been instructed not to allow any guests into the upper floors.)]

With no business being up there anyway, you step back and wonder where to head to next...

You push open the door in front of you, and, stepping inside, you find yourself entering Meraxis's office-cum-waiting room, which one again reminds you of a room that you might expect to see in a very prestigious office building. The flooring consists of dark, polished wooden boards, and slightly off to one side of the room, a large, cream-coloured rug is surrounded on three sides by low-backed black sofas. The cream-painted walls are home to numerous pieces of colourful, abstract art, and on the opposite side from which you entered, there's a single, mahogany door. In each corner of the room, there's a lush, potted plant, and, finally, a low coffee table sits in front of the sofas, and you see that there are several fashion magazines scattered across its surface.

Meraxis is dutifully sitting behind her desk, dressed in the office uniform that her mother makes her wear. Although over one eye she's still sporting her chuuni eyepatch, her vision isn't entirely compromised, and as she sees you enter, she pushes her chair back and starts to get to her feet. #IF siren.isVisiblyPregnant() #THEN #IF !siren.isCharacterReactedToPregnancy(pc) #THEN As she stands up from behind her desk, you see that she's using one hand to cradle her conspicuously-swollen belly, and as she notices what it is you're looking at, she sighs, #IF siren.getPregnantLitter().getFather().equals(pc) #THEN [siren.speech(Yeah, that's right, you ended up getting your own sister pregnant... I knew you were gonna get me knocked up... J-Just because you're the father of our child, doesn't mean you're not my nemesis anymore! S-So, what do you want?!)] #ELSE #IF siren.getPregnantLitter().getFather().equals(lilaya) #THEN [siren.speech(Yeah, that's right, Lilaya ended up getting her own sister pregnant... I knew she was gonna get me knocked up... I-I'm no less capable like this, by the way! I could still annihilate you with ease! S-So, what do you want?!)] #ELSE [siren.speech(Yeah, that's right, mommy ended up getting her own daughter pregnant... I knew she was gonna get me knocked up... I-I'm no less capable like this, by the way! I could still annihilate you with ease! S-So, what do you want?!)] #ENDIF #ENDIF #ELSE As she stands up from behind her desk, you see that her belly is still conspicuously-swollen, and as she notices what it is you're looking at, she sighs, #IF siren.getPregnantLitter().getFather().equals(pc) #THEN [siren.speech(Yeah, that's right, I'm still pregnant, thanks to you... Getting your own sister pregnant... J-Just because you're the father of our child, doesn't mean you're not my nemesis anymore! S-So, what do you want?!)] #ELSE #IF siren.getPregnantLitter().getFather().equals(lilaya) #THEN [siren.speech(Yeah, that's right, I'm still pregnant, thanks to Lilaya... D-Don't think I'm any less capable like this! I could still destroy you with a snap of my fingers! S-So, what do you want?!)] #ELSE [siren.speech(Yeah, that's right, I'm still pregnant, thanks to mommy... D-Don't think I'm any less capable like this! I could still destroy you with a snap of my fingers! S-So, what do you want?!)] #ENDIF #ENDIF #ENDIF #ELSE As she stands up from behind her desk, she points a finger at you and laughs, [siren.speech(Mwhahaha! You dare to casually enter my lair?! I could destroy you with a snap of my fingers!)] #ENDIF

#IF siren.getRaceStage()==RACE_STAGE_GREATER #THEN Although she's now a full demon, you seriously doubt that she'd be able to get away with challenging you to combat just outside your mother's room, and so you confidently reply, #IF pc.hasTraitActivated(PERK_CHUUNI) #THEN [pc.speech(Your powers are no match for mine, little sister! Perhaps one day you might be able to gain one-hundredth of my power, but I don't see that happening any time soon! Now, let me through to see [lyssieth.name]!)] #ELSE [pc.speech(There's no need for us to fight, little sister. I'm here to see [lyssieth.name].)] #ENDIF #ELSE You seriously doubt that she'd be able to get away with challenging you to combat just outside her mother's room, and so you confidently reply, #IF pc.hasTraitActivated(PERK_CHUUNI) #THEN [pc.speech(Your powers are no match for mine, Meraxis! Perhaps one day you might be able to gain one-hundredth of my power, but I don't see that happening any time soon! Now, let me through to see [lyssieth.name]!)] #ELSE [pc.speech(There's no need for us to fight, Meraxis. I'm here to see [lyssieth.name].)] #ENDIF #ENDIF

[siren.speech(~Humph!~)] Meraxis exhales in disapproval, before crossing her arms and sitting down. [siren.speech(Very well, go on through, if you must. Some day we shall duel, however, and I shall show you that I am the undisputed ruler of this universe!)]

Having got permission from Meraxis to see Lyssieth, you wonder if you should enter her office now, or change your mind and leave. If you were to enter, you'd have to do so alone, and leave [npc.name] to sit on one of the sofas, awaiting your return.
Having got permission from Meraxis to see Lyssieth, you wonder if you should enter her office now, or change your mind and leave.

Deciding to proceed forwards and meet with Lyssieth, you cross over to the mahogany door on the far side of the room. Giving it a quick knock, you turn the handle and push it open, before stepping through and entering the elder lilin's office.

Deciding to proceed forwards and meet with Lyssieth, you tell [npc.name] to wait for your return on one of the sofas, and then cross over to the mahogany door on the far side of the room. Giving it a quick knock, you turn the handle and push it open, before stepping through and entering the elder lilin's office.

Just like the waiting room behind you, the floor of this room is covered in dark, wooden boards, which are mostly concealed by a large, cream-coloured rug. The walls are covered in dark wooden panelling, and set into them are numerous book-filled shelves and ornately carved cabinets. In the very middle of the room, there sits a huge, mahogany desk, and on the side nearest to you, there are two empty seats. On the far side, sitting in a very expensive-looking leather chair, is Lyssieth.

As usual, the elder lilin is in her human form, appearing as a stunningly-beautiful, olive-skinned woman, who looks to be in her mid-forties. Her huge, [lyssieth.cupSize]-cup breasts threaten to spill out of her blouse's plunging neckline at any moment, and, as she stands up to greet you, you see that her long, perfect legs are shown-off by the large gap in one side of her long, black, asymmetrical skirt. #IF lyssieth.isVisiblyPregnant() #THEN #IF pc.isVisiblyPregnant() && pc.getPregnantLitter().getFather().equals(lyssieth) #THEN #IF !pc.isCharacterReactedToPregnancy(lyssieth) #THEN #IF !lyssieth.isCharacterReactedToPregnancy(pc) #THEN Far more distracting than her legs, however, is the large bump in her belly, and from the look on her face, she's equally-surprised to see that you're pregnant as well. [lyssieth.speech(You got me pregnant... And I got you pregnant as well?! It looks like my family's soon to grow a lot larger... So, other than to announce your pregnancy, what brings you here?)] #ELSE Far more distracting than her legs, however, is the large bump in her belly, and after tucking a loose strand of her wavy, dark-brown hair behind one ear, she sighs, [lyssieth.speech(That's right, you got me pregnant... And I see you're still expecting as well. It looks like my family's soon to grow a lot larger... So, what brings you here?)] #ENDIF #ELSE #IF !lyssieth.isCharacterReactedToPregnancy(pc) #THEN You see that she's still got a large bump in her belly, and her eyes open wide as she sees that you're now pregnant as well. [lyssieth.speech(I got you pregnant?! It seems as though my family's soon to grow a lot larger... So, other than to announce your pregnancy, what brings you here?)] #ELSE You see that she's still got a large bump in her belly, and she smiles as her gaze drifts down to see that you're still pregnant as well. [lyssieth.speech(I see that we're both still pregnant with one another's children... So, what brings you here?)] #ENDIF #ENDIF #ELSE #IF !lyssieth.isCharacterReactedToPregnancy(pc) #THEN Far more distracting than her legs, however, is the large bump in her belly, and after tucking a loose strand of her wavy, dark-brown hair behind one ear, she sighs, [lyssieth.speech(That's right, you got me pregnant... It looks like my family's soon to grow larger... So, what brings you here?)] #ELSE You see that she's still got a large bump in her belly, and after tucking a loose strand of her wavy, dark-brown hair behind one ear, she sighs, [lyssieth.speech(That's right, I'm still pregnant with your children... So, what brings you here?)] #ENDIF #ENDIF #ELSE #IF pc.isVisiblyPregnant() && pc.getPregnantLitter().getFather().equals(lyssieth) #THEN #IF !lyssieth.isCharacterReactedToPregnancy(pc) #THEN Far more distracting than her legs, however, is the surprised look on her face as she sees that you're pregnant. [lyssieth.speech(I got you pregnant?! I hope everything's going well for you... So, other than to announce your pregnancy, what brings you here?)] #ELSE She sees that you've still got a large bump in your belly, and after tucking a loose strand of her wavy, dark-brown hair behind one ear, she sighs, [lyssieth.speech(Ah, you're still pregnant with our children? I hope everything's going well for you... So, what brings you here?)] #ENDIF #ELSE Tucking a loose strand of her wavy, dark-brown hair behind one ear, she pushes her stylish half-rim glasses up onto the bridge of her nose, #IF pc.getRace()==RACE_DEMON #THEN #IF pc.hasFetish(FETISH_INCEST) #THEN before striding over to you and pulling you into a loving hug. [lyssieth.speech(Aww, you came to visit your mommy again! How sweet of you!)] #ELSE before striding over to you and pulling you into a loving hug. [lyssieth.speech(Aww, you came to visit me again! How sweet of you!)] #ENDIF #ELSE before smiling fondly at you. [lyssieth.speech(Hello again, [pc.name]. What can I do for you?)] #ENDIF #ENDIF #ENDIF

Telling Lyssieth that you'll come back and see her another time, you make your exit and head back out into [siren.namePos] office. Looking up at you from behind her desk, the little succubus calls out, [siren.speech(While now would be the perfect time to challenge you to a duel, mommy said I have to sort out her paperwork... I-I'll get you next time!)]

#IF pc.hasTraitActivated(PERK_CHUUNI) #THEN [pc.speech(That's lucky for you; I'm vastly more powerful than you could ever imagine!)] you declare, before marching over to the door on the far side of the room and quickly making your exit. #ELSE [pc.speech(Ok, see you next time,)] you say, rolling your eyes. Before the little chunni can make any more outrageous statements, you march over to the door on the far side of the room and quickly make your exit. #ENDIF

Stepping back out into the palace's corridor, you wonder what to do now...

Telling Lyssieth that you'll come back and see her another time, you make your exit and head back out into [siren.namePos] office. Looking up at you from behind her desk, the little succubus calls out, [siren.speech(While now would be the perfect time to challenge you to a duel, mommy said I have to sort out her paperwork... I-I'll get you next time!)]

#IF pc.hasTraitActivated(PERK_CHUUNI) #THEN [pc.speech(That's lucky for you; I'm vastly more powerful than you could ever imagine!)] you declare, before telling [npc.name] to follow you and then marching over to the door on the far side of the room. #ELSE [pc.speech(Ok, see you next time,)] you say, rolling your eyes. Before the little chunni can make any more outrageous statements, you tell [npc.name] to follow you and then march over to the door on the far side of the room. #ENDIF

Quickly making your exit, the two of you step back out into the palace's corridor, and you wonder what to do now...

Wanting to return to Lilaya's home, you ask, [pc.speech(Could you teleport me back to see Lilaya? I have some things I need to ask her about.)]

[lyssieth.speech(Of course,)] Lyssieth responds, before stepping forwards and pulling you into a hug. As her [lyssieth.breastSize] breasts press against your chest, your surroundings are suddenly hidden from view by a bright flash of purple light...

As the illumination quickly fades away, you find yourself standing in Lilaya's laboratory. Sitting in a chair nearby, there's the familiar figure of Lilaya, and in her lap, passionately kissing her, is Rose. Upon seeing her daughter's lips locked with those of her cat-girl maid's, Lyssieth lets out a particularly angry huff, interrupting their make-out session.

[lilaya.speech(O-Oh, mommy!)] Lilaya calls out, disentangling herself from Rose's intimate clutches and jumping to her feet. [lilaya.speech(I-I was just p-punishing Rose...)]

[lyssieth.speech(Oh, of course, that's exactly what you were doing, I'm sure,)] Lyssieth sarcastically replies, and, not even waiting to hear her daughter's response, she disappears again in a flash of purple light.

[lilaya.speech(W-Well... What is it you wanted, [pc.name]?)] Lilaya asks, brushing down her skirt and trying hard not to blush.

Wanting to return to Lilaya's home, you ask, [pc.speech(Could you teleport me back to see Lilaya? I have some things I need to ask her about.)]

[lyssieth.speech(Of course,)] Lyssieth responds, before calling your companion back in from Meraxis's office and then stepping forwards and pulling you and [npc.name] into a hug. As her [lyssieth.breastSize] breasts press against your chest, your surroundings are suddenly hidden from view by a bright flash of purple light...

As the illumination quickly fades away, the three of you find yourselves standing in Lilaya's laboratory. Sitting in a chair nearby, there's the familiar figure of Lilaya, and in her lap, passionately kissing her, is Rose. Upon seeing her daughter's lips locked with those of her cat-girl maid's, Lyssieth lets out a particularly angry huff, interrupting their make-out session.

[lilaya.speech(O-Oh, mommy!)] Lilaya calls out, disentangling herself from Rose's intimate clutches and jumping to her feet. [lilaya.speech(I-I was just p-punishing Rose...)]

[lyssieth.speech(Oh, of course, that's exactly what you were doing, I'm sure,)] Lyssieth sarcastically replies, and, not even waiting to hear her daughter's response, she disappears again in a flash of purple light.

[lilaya.speech(W-Well... What is it you wanted, [pc.name]?)] Lilaya asks, brushing down her skirt and trying hard not to blush.

Wanting to know how Lyssieth regards her sister, you ask, [pc.speech(What can you tell me about Lunette?)]

#IF pc.getRace()==RACE_DEMON #THEN #IF pc.hasFetish(FETISH_INCEST) #THEN [lyssieth.speech(Oh, you want to know a little more about mommy's little sister? I suppose now that I'm your mommy, she's technically your aunt,)] #ELSE [lyssieth.speech(Oh, you want to know a little more about my little sister? I suppose now that I'm your mother, she's technically your aunt,)] #ENDIF #ELSE [lyssieth.speech(Oh, you want to know a little more about my little sister?)] #ENDIF Lyssieth says, smiling at you, [lyssieth.speech(Well, to begin, although she's the fifth-born of we elder lilin, she's by far the most belligerent and short-tempered. The slightest thing can send her into a towering rage, and while we lilin have nothing to fear from her, the other races aren't quite so fortunate. The last time I visited her, one of her slaves dropped and smashed a favourite glass of hers, and she wouldn't stop shrieking and cursing until she'd mounted the unfortunate cat-girl and given her such a rough fucking that she could barely stand up afterwards.)]

Shaking her head in despair, Lyssieth crosses the room and retrieves a large, ribbon-bound scroll from one of the many shelves lining the walls. As she unrolls it across her desk, you see that it's a map of Dominion and the surrounding lands. Tracing a large circle around the capital city with her finger, she says, [lyssieth.speech(This whole area is known as the Foloi fields, and is primarily made up of farmland interspersed with small villages. Lilith assigned this whole region's administration to Lunette, who interpreted our mother's orders as a warrant to treat the inhabitants like dirt. When she's not resting in one of the many forests which surround the fields, she's leading her herd of demonic centaurs to terrorise the lands she rules over.)]

[pc.speech(And the inhabitants have done nothing about this?)] you ask.

[lyssieth.speech(There's nothing they can do; even the most powerful of lilin must submit to an elder lilin's wishes. The only one who dares to indirectly stand up to her is the lilin 'Minotallys'; the mayor of the town of Elis, she likes to take on the form of a cow-girl, and from what I hear, she's the one responsible for some bands of farmers daring to try and fight back against Lunette. Of course they stand no chance, but perhaps if you and the youko were to help, they could be the key to defeating her...)]

Rolling up the map, Lyssieth places it back on the shelf, before continuing, [lyssieth.speech(The only other thing to mention is the fact that Lunette takes on the form of a huge pegataur. You see, when you released us from the mirror, we had a short while in which to explore, and Lunette seemed particularly fond of the museum's exhibit on ancient Greek mythology. When mother's spell backfired, and all manner of anthropomorphic and mythological creatures were created, Lunette immediately sought out and subdued the centaurs, before breeding both herself and demons with them in order to make her demonic followers...)]

Now that Lyssieth has told you all about her younger sister, you thank her for the information, before wondering what to do next...

#IF pc.getRace()==RACE_DEMON #THEN #IF pc.hasFetish(FETISH_INCEST) #THEN [pc.speech(Mommy, I want to know more about my new family,)] you say, eager to hear more about Lyssieth's daughters, sisters and mother. #ELSE [pc.speech(I want to know more about my new family,)] you say, eager to hear more about Lyssieth's daughters, sisters and mother. #ENDIF #ELSE [pc.speech(I'd like to know more about your family,)] you say, eager to hear more about Lyssieth's daughters, sisters and mother. #ENDIF

[lyssieth.speech(Well, you already know, although I have many, many sons and daughters, Lilaya and Meraxis are the only two which I've ever officially recognised. If it were up to me, I'd have recognised all of my offspring, so that they may have risen above the half-demon stigma that runs through our society. Mother, however, has made it quite clear that she will tolerate no more half-demons in her family tree. I imagine that if I were to disobey her, she'd ramp up persecution against humans just to punish me. She's always mistrusted me, right from the moment she saw me treating my first love as an equal...)] Lyssieth sighs, clearly not wanting to say any more about that, [lyssieth.speech(So as far as my offspring go, it's just Lilaya and Meraxis who carry my full authority. As to my mother, she's just as you'd expect; controlling, cruel, and filled with hate for humankind. Whatever caused her to despise them so much, she's never told anyone. My sisters nor I know for sure who our father is, but we suspect that we were all the result of Lilith impregnating herself...)]

[pc.speech(I see... And what about your sisters?)] you ask.

[lyssieth.speech(Well, as you already know, there are seven of us elder lilin, and, from eldest to youngest, they're: Lirecea, who rules the underwater city of Lyonesse in the form of an octopus-girl; Lovienne and Lasielle, the twins who serve as Lilith's personal bodyguards; myself, who you already know all about; Lunette, who takes the form of a huge pegataur and terrorises the Foloi fields at the head of her herd of demonic centaur; Lyxias, who, taking the form of a great feathered lamia, rules over the jungle city of Itza'aak in the north; and finally, Lisophia, who takes the form of a dragon-girl and rules over the desert and savannah to the south.)]

[pc.speech(And the non-elder lilin?)]

[lyssieth.speech(Ah, well, there are far too many of my other sisters for me to name individually,)] Lyssieth softly laughs, [lyssieth.speech(While the ones you may encounter here in this new reality are as ignorant as everyone else as to the goings on in the rest of the world, the ones out in your original reality are not particularly happy with us elder lilin or my mother.)]

[pc.speech(Why's that?)] you ask.

[lyssieth.speech(Because we inadvertently ruined all of their plans,)] Lyssieth states, [lyssieth.speech(As I already told you before, while Lilith and we elder lilin were sealed away in the mirror, the lilin and demons we left behind took control of all of humanity. By seduction, subterfuge, and every duplicitous method imaginable, they've been able to maintain control over the world's governments throughout almost all of recorded history. Their control was so absolute that when Lilith reappeared, she could have taken over as the true ruler of the world in a matter of days. Her choice to unleash her reality-changing spell ruined all of that, however, as the population-controlling resources which the lilin had at their disposal are now all being used to prevent news of Lilith's arrival spreading.)]

[pc.speech(So four thousand years of preparation for Lilith's return went to waste?)]

[lyssieth.speech(Pretty much,)] Lyssieth says, [lyssieth.speech(but I am happy for how it's all worked out. If either the spell or the lilin's plans were executed correctly, humanity would have been doomed.)]

Now that Lyssieth has told you about her family, you wonder what to ask her next...

After confirming their existence to you before, you're desperate to know more about angels, and so you ask, [pc.speech(Can you tell me more about Samael and the archangels? What ever happened to each of them?)]

Lyssieth's expression darkens as you ask this, but she nevertheless answers, [lyssieth.speech(As you already know, my sisters and I had already captured the seven archangels before Samael sealed us in the mirror. As we were holding them close as hostages, all seven of the archangels were sealed in there with us. They tried to break free at first, but we elder lilin are far more powerful than each of them, and, without mother even having to assist, we quickly subdued them. Disgusted by their presence, Lilith ordered each of us to take one of the archangels, and corrupt them into whatever forms we desired...)]

[pc.speech(But you didn't do that to the one given to you?)] you ask, remembering that that's what Lyssieth told you before.

[lyssieth.speech(That's right. While angels are disgusting creatures, I can't help but see how similar they are to humans in a lot of ways,)] Lyssieth sighs, [lyssieth.speech(You said before that you witnessed a vision of when I first captured Valoel; he was given to me because of my actions that day. I tried to keep him away from my sisters and mother for as long as I could, but Lilith eventually suspected that I was treating him well. She got quite angry when she found out that I hadn't 'used' him even once...)]

Lyssieth pauses for a moment, clearly upset by the memory. Not wanting to interrupt her, you wait in silence for a moment, and your patience is rewarded when the elder lilin lets out another deep sigh and continues her tale, [lyssieth.speech(Mother has never physically punished any of us; she prefers to find other ways in which to hurt us. Seeing how I was trying to protect Valoel, she made me watch as she ruthlessly fucked him over and over again, twisting and corrupting him into a demonic version of himself. Even to me, the one who was supposed to ruin him, he was always kind and considerate, but once mother had finished with him, his mind had been warped and twisted. He now serves as Lilith's jailor in her tower, loving nothing more than to sadistically abuse and fuck her prisoners...)]

[pc.speech(What of the others?)] you ask, wanting to know what happened to the other six archangels.

[lyssieth.speech(They were all similarly ruined by my sisters. I don't know if you've seen that obscene statue in Slaver Alley, but that's the archangel, Marlel, who was given to my eldest sister, Lirecea. Every time she visits Dominion, she reverts her petrification, fucks her, and then turns her back into a statue again at the moment of her orgasm. With the exception of Valoel, all the other archangels were similarly feminised and turned into fallen angels,)] Lyssieth explains, before going on to list them, [lyssieth.speech(Humatiel was given to Lovienne, who turned him into her lust-crazed nymphomaniac futa fuck-toy. Araqiel was given to the other of mother's personal bodyguards, Lasielle, and he was turned into a cum-crazed trap who cleans up after their frequent orgies. The last three are kept as fuck-toys by my younger three sisters; Asteraoth is owned by Lunette, Vretiel by Lyxias, and Mydaiel by Lisophia.)]

Despite the extreme nature of the archangel's fates, Lyssieth doesn't seem as concerned for them as she was for Valoel. You realise that even though Lyssieth is far kinder than her sisters, she's still an elder lilin, and shares her sisters' deep dislike of angels she's not familiar with.
